Package com.guglielmoDelSarto.economics.utilityFunctions

Class AdditiveUtility2D

java.lang.Object
com.guglielmoDelSarto.economics.utilityFunctions.AdditiveUtility2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
MultidimensionalUtilityFunction
public class AdditiveUtility2D
extends java.lang.Object
implements MultidimensionalUtilityFunction
This class represent the function used in section two of the thesis
U(ct, cT) = u(ct) + vT(cT)
Since:
Version 1.0
Author:
Guglielmo Del Sarto
